title: Radiant Ruby-Accented Diamond Bangles
materials: Faceted Round Rubies. Precisely crafted using traditional techniques and finished with a high-shine.
features: These bangles feature a modern, minimalist design that beautifully showcases the brilliance of the diamonds and the rich color of the rubies. Each diamond and ruby is meticulously set in a delicate channel setting for maximum sparkle and durability. These bangles are ideal for everyday wear and for special occasions.
colors: Warm gold tone with sparkling white diamonds and deep red rubies.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti
or as a stylish addition to everyday wear.
description: These bangles are a perfect blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The use of high-quality diamonds and rubies ensures lasting beauty and value. They make a thoughtful gift for any occasion, representing love, prosperity, and good fortune.
